column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The beautiful love of my life took me here for my birthday
column3: it was hands down one of the best birthday presents a man can get from his woman.  We returned here again
column4: and the service is still as good as it gets
column5: and the food is absolutely amazing.  I love how you can select from different flavors of sangria
column6: and that you can order a pitcher of it at a reasonable price
column9: or group to casually consume.  I'm quite honestly hooked on this place
column10: and I wait to introduce Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba to other friends and family.
